mapper.sql: m.ECI_ID, m.ECI_Swift_Number, m.ECI_State, m.ECI_Table_ID, m.ECI_Waiter_ID, m.ECI_Cashier_ID, m.ECI_Customer_ID, m.ECI_Mem_ID, m.ECI_Dish_Nums, m.ECI_Amount_Peoplo, m.ECI_Repast_Time, m.ECI_Bill_Time, ECI_Pay_Method, m.ECI_Consume_Amount, m.ECI_Discount, m.ECI_Paid_Amount, m.ECI_Remark
mapper.select:
select
distinct
, , , , f. ECC_ID,f.ECC_Total_Price,f.ECC_Dish_ID,fi.dish_Id,fi.dish_Name,fi.dish_price,si.table_Id,si.table_Name,si.table_state, se.employee_Id as Cashier_employee_Id,se.employee_Name as Cashier_employee_Name,ei.customer_Id,ei.customer_Name,ei.customer_Tel,ei .customer_Gender,ni.mem_ID,ni.mem_Name,ni.mem_User_Name,ni.mem_Tel,ni.mem_Gender from t_endcarteinfo m
LEFT JOIN t_endCarteContent f ON m.ECI_ID=f.ECC_ECI_ID LEFT JOIN t_dish fi ON f.ECC_Dish_Id=fi.dish_id LEFT JOIN t_dinningTable si ON m.ECI_Table_ID=si.table_ID LEFT JOIN t_EmployeeInfo se ON m.ECI_Cashier_ID=se.employee_Id LEFT JOIN t_Customer ei ON m.ECI_Customer_ID=ei.Customer_ID LEFT JOIN t_MemberInfo ni ON m.ECI_Mem_ID=ni.Mem_ID
order by ${orderByClause}

select , , , , f. ECC_ID,f.ECC_Total_Price,f.ECC_Dish_ID,fi.dish_Id,fi.dish_Name,fi.dish_price,si.table_Id,si.table_Name,si.table_state, se.employee_Id as Cashier_employee_Id,se.employee_Name as Cashier_employee_Name,ei.customer_Id,ei.customer_Name,ei.customer_Tel,ei .customer_Gender,ni.mem_ID,ni.mem_Name,ni.mem_User_Name,ni.mem_Tel,ni.mem_Gender from t_endcarteinfo m
LEFT JOIN t_endCarteContent f ON m.ECI_ID=f.ECC_ECI_ID LEFT JOIN t_dish fi ON f.ECC_Dish_Id=fi.dish_id LEFT JOIN t_dinningTable si ON m.ECI_Table_ID=si.table_ID LEFT JOIN t_EmployeeInfo se ON m.ECI_Cashier_ID=se.employee_Id LEFT JOIN t_Customer ei ON m.ECI_Customer_ID=ei.Customer_ID LEFT JOIN t_MemberInfo ni ON m.ECI_Mem_ID=ni.Mem_ID where ECI_ID = #{eciId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete: delete m from t_endcarteinfo m where ECI_ID = #{eciId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into t_endcarteinfo (ECI_ID, ECI_Swift_Number, ECI_State, ECI_Table_ID, ECI_Waiter_ID, ECI_Cashier_ID, ECI_Customer_ID, ECI_Mem_ID, ECI_Dish_Nums, ECI_Amount_Peoplo, ECI_Repast_Time, ECI_Bill_Time, ECI_Pay_Method, ECI_Consume_Amount, ECI_Discount, ECI_Paid_Amount, ECI_Remark, del_Flag, last_SubTime, subBy) values (#{eciId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eciSwiftNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eciState,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{dinningTable.tableId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eciWaiter.employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eciCashier.employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{customer.customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberInfo.memId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eciDishNums,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eciAmountPeoplo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eciRepastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{eciBillTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{eciPayMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eciConsumeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{eciDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{eciPaidAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{eciRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{lastSubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{user.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update t_endcarteinfo m
ECI_ID = #{record.eciId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ECI_Swift_Number = #{record.eciSwiftNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ECI_State = #{record.eciState,jdbcType=TINYINT},
ECI_Table_ID = #{record.dinningTable.tableId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ECI_Waiter_ID = #{record.eciWaiter.employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ECI_Cashier_ID = #{record.eciCashier.employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ECI_Customer_ID = #{record.customer.customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ECI_Mem_ID = #{record.memberInfo.memId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ECI_Dish_Nums = #{record.eciDishNums,jdbcType=INTEGER},

ECI_Consume_Amount = #{record.eciConsumeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ECI_Discount = #{record.eciDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ECI_Paid_Amount = #{record.eciPaidAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ECI_Remark = #{record.eciRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_Flag = #{record.delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
last_SubTime = #{record.lastSubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
subBy = #{record.user.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
